name: Wood Elf Sharpshooter
description: The Wood Elf Sharpshooter is known for its exceptional agility and precision, equipped with a longsword and longbow, and possesses keen hearing and sight.
memorable: With its high passive perception and ability to ignore cover, this sharpshooter can strike enemies from unexpected angles.
goals: To engage adversaries from a distance while remaining undetected.
relations: Often found in the company of other elves or ranger allies, this sharpshooter may serve as a scout or protector.
environment: Typically inhabits forests and wilderness areas, ideal for ambush tactics.
strengths: Exceptional agility and precision in ranged combat, with abilities that enhance stealth and survivability.
weaknesses: Reliance on Dexterity can be a disadvantage in close melee encounters.
attacks: Strikes twice in one turn with a longbow that can hit from great distances, ignoring cover.
most_powerful_ability: Trained Accuracy enhances its weapon attacks, significantly increasing damage output.
equipment: Longsword and longbow, effective in both melee and ranged combat.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 20, indicating exceptional awareness of surroundings.
skills: Skilled in stealth, survival, and having very good perception abilities.
additional_information: Can move without leaving tracks due to Trackless Travel.
Has advantage on Perception checks related to hearing or sight.
Can reposition without provoking opportunity attacks.
Combines melee and ranged attacks effectively as an ambusher.
Uses Aimed Strike for increased accuracy on attacks.
test_queries: stealthy elf with a longbow and longsword
ambush tactics with precise ranged attacks
wood elf skilled in stealth and survival
agile sharpshooter ignoring cover in battle
ranged combat specialist with keen senses
